item.title: Security: Protect against POET Attacks with Custom Errors!
item.description: Thereâ€™s been a big deal made of a serious security flaw in ASP.Net which potentially affects a lot of .Net sites, that allows a 3rd Party to trick ASP.Net into serving sensitive files within a web application folder.  Microsoft have released official advise on how to temporarily patch the problem which revolves around forcing Error  and Page Not found pages to return the same status page.  This would need to stay in place until a permanent fix is released.
